column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I left my house and drove to the store .
#text=I parked the car , walked inside and grabbed a shopping cart .
#text=I looked at my list and saw that I needed some fresh produce .
#text=I picked out the best looking strawberries , they were on sale for $ 2 a pound .
#text=I bought several pounds because my daughter loves fresh strawberries .
#text=I finished up in the produce section , buying some things to make a green salad later to go with dinner .
#text=I then stopped at the meat section and picked out some nice cuts of steak for dinner .
#text=I went into the frozen foods section and found ice cream was also on sale .
#text=I went through the rest of the aisles , consulting my list and picking out what my family needed .
#text=When I had found everything I needed , and put them in my cart , I walked over to the checkout lanes .
#text=I stood in line and waited for my turn .
#text=Finally , it was my turn and the checkout person checked me out .
#text=I paid my bill , and walked out to my car with the shopping cart .
#text=Then I loaded the car up with the groceries , returned the cart and drove home .
